channel.title: Public *adding friends and players on*
channel.description:
Okay, everytime i edit a server and then try making it public it never works and just messes up so, this time im going to ask for help. Can anyone give me a full guide on how to make my server public.
Hint In one step i think you type in cmd and get the code and paste it in the url browser yeah i have 2wire so if anyone can help or make a guide or anything i will praise you (:!

I can try to help, I did mine on 2wire pm me your teamviewer stuff

item.title: Public *adding friends and players on*
item.dc:creator: @Tylerd21 Tylerd21
item.description:
@Tylerd21 wrote:

Log into your router,

port foward with 43594,

change the server IP.

or use the No - IP method, youâ€™re better off looking up a guide for hosting servers.
